item.description:
UPDATE:  We have the choice of two performances - Saturday night at Montvale Plaza or Sunday night at the Hilltop.

We will have a private table for this performance of the singing impressionist.

Joey Will Perform The Voices of 40 Legends: Frank Sinatra! Tony Bennett! Bobby Darin! Tom Jones! Sam Cooke! Robert DeNiro! Joe Pesci! Rodney Dangerfield! Cher! Neil Diamond! Al Pacino! Elvis Presley! Wayne Newton! Joe Cocker! Dave Matthews! Gavin DeGraw! Van Morrison! Johnny Mathis! Rod Stewart! Al Green! Michael McDonald, Blondie and others.

We have a group price of $45.00.

A $2 meetup rsvp is required to hold your reservation.

What a fun time ahead!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Joey Voices - Dinner and Show (Montvale Plaza)
